nodes.text: Daro Blunt was a human male smuggler in the band of the Aqualish Bandin Dobah in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. After being informed by Zalg that a group of adventurers tracked down Dobah to retrieve the droid R4-W9, he tried with Spir Fraxis and Gut-Guro to kill them.
